metadata.title: CVE-2023-50628 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in libming version 0.4.8, allows attackers toexecute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via parser.ccomponent.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
